DepositFinalized(address,address,address.custom:legacy: @notice Emitted whenever an ERC20 deposit is finalized.

params.extraData: Extra data attached to the deposit.
params.l1Token: Address of the token on L1.
params.l2Token: Address of the corresponding token on L2.
params.to: Address of the recipient on L2.

WithdrawalInitiated(address,address,addr.custom:legacy: @notice Emitted whenever a withdrawal from L2 to L1 is initiated.

params.extraData: Extra data attached to the withdrawal.
params.l1Token: Address of the token on L1.
params.l2Token: Address of the corresponding token on L2.
params.to: Address of the recipient on L1.

finalizeDeposit(address,address,address,.custom:legacy: @notice Finalizes a deposit from L1 to L2.

params._amount: Amount of the tokens being deposited.
params._extraData: Extra data attached to the deposit.
params._l1Token: Address of the L1 token to deposit.
params._l2Token: Address of the corresponding L2 token.

withdraw(address,uint256,uint32,bytes).custom:legacy: @notice Initiates a withdrawal from L2 to L1.

params._amount: Amount of the L2 token to withdraw.
params._extraData: Extra data attached to the withdrawal.
params._l2Token: Address of the L2 token to withdraw.
params._minGasLimit: Minimum gas limit to use for the transaction.
